file_content.text: The pirate attacks have started to ease up. Guess the Hailstorm Brotherhood needs to eat, too.
You sabotaged the Hailstorm Brotherhood's foodstuffs? Excellent!
That ought to limit the pirates' numbers on the front lines, at least for a time.
We'll make the most of the breathing room you've given us. Thank you for your assistance.
Find and destroy the Hailstorm Brotherhood's food stores. If that doesn't force them back, I don't know what will.
Don't let your guard down out there, Jedi. These wastes are crawling with pirates.
Watch your back out there, sir. This sector is crawling with pirates.
Keep your eyes peeled, Captain. This area isn't safe, not by a long shot.
Stay sharp. You may not see them, but there's pirates out there.
Blasted Hailstorm scum have been attacking us nonstop. Haven't had a decent night's sleep in weeks.
They're wearing us down, making us tired, vulnerable. Won't be long before they storm the outpost and finish us off.
Take the battle to them.
They've got us outmanned and outgunned. No chance we'll beat them with brute force. But maybe we won't have to.
What's your plan?
Either we start preparing our tragic last stand... or we find a way to force them back.
So basically, you're doomed.
The situation's not completely hopeless... at least, not yet.
Food out here is as scarce as it is dangerous. On Hoth, the wildlife eats you, not the other way around.
If you sabotaged the Hailstorm's food supplies, they'd be forced to pull back and hunt--or starve. Either way, we win.
Leave it to me.
You've got a blaster--use it.
Three weeks of pulling double guard duty has made me sloppy. I'd just get myself killed out there.
We've got a lead on where the Hailstorm is storing their foodstuffs. Security there is tight, but I'm sure you've faced worse.
Just find the food stores, destroy them and get out. We'll let hunger handle the rest.
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
Understood.
The Hailstorm Brotherhood will overrun us any day now. Best get out while you can.
